message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I understand your offer, the value of this product to you is significant, and I'm confident it will bring you substantial returns. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $12,500?
